item.title: Automation: Easy Button vs Sentient Voodoo Magic Button
item.description: Automation has become this “all-encompassing thingy” much like SDN. It’s a software industry problem and it’s critical more now than ever that we do not slip backwards by trying to drag a broken idea forwards.
